mapper.select: SELECT p.*, a.UUID AS AGREEMENT_UUID, a.AGREEMENT_CODE, a.CARRIER_NAME AS AGREEMENT_CARRIER_NAME, a.SHIP_OWNER AS AGREEMENT_SHIP_OWNER, a.SHIP_NAME AS AGREEMENT_SHIP_NAME, a.LAYCAN AS AGREEMENT_laycan, a.LOAD_PORT AS AGREEMENT_LOAD_PORT, a.UNLOAD_PORT AS AGREEMENT_UNLOAD_PORT FROM t_ship_ship_pact p, t_ship_agreement a WHERE p.ALIVE_FLAG = '1' AND p.uuid = a.ship_pact_uuid AND p.EP_MEMBER_ID= #{epMemberId} and a.agreement_code = #{agreementCode} limit #{fromIndex},#{pageSize}
select * from t_ship_ship_pact where SHIP_PACT_ID=#{shipPactId} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_ship_ship_pact where UUID=#{uuid} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'

select SHIP_PACT_ID as "shipPactId" , UUID as "uuid" , PACT_CODE as "pactCode" , EP_MEMBER_ID as "epMemberId" , STATUS as "status" , LOAD_PORT as "loadPort" , DETAIL_STATUS as "detailStatus" , SHIP_PLATE_ID as "shipPlateId" , SHIP_PLATE_UUID as "shipPlateUuid" , SIGN_DATE as "signDate" , CARRIER_ID as "carrierId" , CARRIER_NAME as "carrierName" , SHIP_OWNER as "shipOwner" , SHIP_NAME as "shipName" , PACT_BEG as "pactBeg" , PACT_END as "pactEnd" , PACT_TEXT as "pactText" , MIN_QUANTITY as "minQuantity" , WS as "ws" , WS_RES as "wsRes" , PACT_SPEED as "pactSpeed" , DEMURRAGE as "demurrage" , BROKER_ID as "brokerId" , BROKER_NAME as "brokerName" , DOCK_TIME as "dockTime" , ACCESSORY as "accessory" , ACCESSORY_PATH as "accessoryPath" , MMSI as "mmsi" , REMARK as "remark" , ALIVE_FLAG as "aliveFlag" , VERSION as "version" , LANG_VER as "langVer" , CREATE_DATE as "createDate" , UPDATE_DATE as "updateDate" , CREATE_USER as "createUser" , UPDATE_USER as "updateUser" , EXT1 as "ext1" , SHIP_INTENTION_ID as "shipIntentionId" , SHIP_INTENTION_UUID as "shipIntentionUuid" , LOADING_AREA as "loadingArea" , UNLOADING_AREA as "unloadingArea" , UNLOADING_AREA as "unloadingArea" , SHIP_OWNER_ID as "shipOwnerId" , EP_MEMBER_NAME_EN as "epMemberNameEn" , SHIP_OWNER_EN as "shipOwnerEn" , CARRIER_NAME_EN as "carrierNameEn" , BROKER_NAME_EN as "brokerNameEn" , SYS_SHIP_UUID as "sysShipUuid" from t_ship_ship_pact where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and PACT_CODE like CONCAT('%',#{pactCode},'%') and STATUS=#{status} and SHIP_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{shipName},'%') and UUID in (select SHIP_PACT_UUID from t_ship_waybill where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and AGREEMENT_CODE like CONCAT('%',#{agreementCode},'%')) and SHIP_PLATE_UUID in (select UUID from t_ship_ship_plate where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and ( EP_MEMBER_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{publishName},'%') or EP_MEMBER_NAME_EN like CONCAT('%',#{publishName},'%'))) and (CARRIER_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{carrierName},'%') or CARRIER_NAME_EN like CONCAT('%',#{carrierName},'%') ) and (SHIP_OWNER like CONCAT('%',#{shipOwner},'%') or SHIP_OWNER_EN like CONCAT('%',#{shipOwner},'%')) and DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{createBeg} and DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{createEnd} and DATE_FORMAT(PACT_BEG, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{laycanBeg} and DATE_FORMAT(PACT_END, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{laycanEnd} and UUID in (select SHIP_PACT_UUID from t_ship_waybill where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and DATE_FORMAT(PACT_BEG, '%Y-%m-%d') >=#{laycanBeg}) and UUID in (select SHIP_PACT_UUID from t_ship_waybill where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and DATE_FORMAT(PACT_END, '%Y-%m-%d') <=#{laycanEnd}) and UUID in (select SHIP_PACT_UUID from t_ship_waybill where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and OII_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{oilType},'%')) and LOADING_AREA like CONCAT('%',#{loadPort},'%') and UNLOADING_AREA like CONCAT('%',#{unloadPort},'%') and UUID in (select SHIP_PACT_UUID from t_ship_waybill where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and LOAD_PORT like CONCAT('%',#{loadPort},'%')) and UUID in (select SHIP_PACT_UUID from t_ship_waybill where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and UNLOAD_PORT like CONCAT('%',#{unloadPort},'%'))
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
